comment: Made an extremely easy class ridiculously hard. Honestly, unfair grading on projects. Said studying the 2 tests from this semester would be sufficient for the final exam but that was not true.

If you like your classes like your Georgia weather, awful, inconsistent and not making any sense, his class is for you. Not clear throughout and can't even recall his own final to clarify what he put on it. He's a really chill person don't get me wrong, but not fit to teach yet.

He could have been more detailed when giving a rubric. The rubric's are very vague. Therefore, you probably will make a low grade on his assignments. He is very boring. On the days he didn't attend Dee Grindell usually would come in teach. She's amazing take her instead!
gave too many projects due on the same day and does not make it clear how to do projects and what he wants on them

FDB!  does not teach well he has other people come to teach to the class more than he does and does not even stay when they come  grades hard i would not recommend anyone to take a KSU seminar class that he teaches
Good looking guy, responds well to the question "Do you even lift bro?" Very informed, but not extremely patient.
